about_the_game:
A Magical Adventure Through Realms


Hexrite is a 3rd person action-adventure game set in a stylized fantasy world where you take on the role of a sorcerer embarking on a quest to complete an ancient ritual, in your journey you'll face dangerous foes, meet peculiar beings and transverse fantastical landscapes.

ARSENAL OF SPELLS


You have access to a vast arsenal of spells that you can use against enemies and bosses through a classic action-packed combat system, upgrade spells for new uses and uncover forbidden magic to help you defeat your foes! ✨

Collect, upgrade and cast dozens of spells, from summoning magical portals to freezing time, there's plenty of ways to deal with enemies!

DOMES OF MAGIC


Domes are powerful fields of magic you can cast that change the state of the area surrounding you and your enemies, summon magical mines, conjure up poison clouds or turn the floor into a slippery field! 🔮

Conjure Domes, powerful magical spells that change the battlefield around you, altering the way you and the enemies fight!

CHARACTERS GALORE


You'll meet some friendly faces along the way that might need your help, in return for your troubles, you'll be rewarded with items and spells that will aid you on your journey! 🧙

Meet a cast of quirky characters throughout your journey and embark on quests for them to obtain bountiful rewards!

FANTASTICAL LANDS


Platform throughout floating islands using your various movement abilities, visit haunted cities and adventure inside magical castles! 🌌

Explore fantastical landscapes by blasting, springing and gliding across them and uncover the secrets hidden throughout these worlds!
